Latest official version of JDemetra+ can be found at

[https://github.com/jdemetra/jdplus-main/releases/tag/v3.2.4](https://github.com/jdemetra/jdplus-main/releases/tag/v3.2.4)

For installing instructions see [https://jdemetra-new-documentation.netlify.app/#installing-the-software](https://jdemetra-new-documentation.netlify.app/#installing-the-software)

Note that Java 17 is now embedded is in the installation files, you don't need to tackle this issue on your computer. Be sure to choose the windows specific zip file (if you use windows).
